title: Fitness Studio, Fireplace*, Online Maintenance Requests
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME!', 'Located in the heart of the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, Post Oak Place is situated in Euless, just minutes from Highway 360.', 'This terrific location is convenient to the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, the Irving Convention Center, the University of Dallas, Downtown Dallas, and Downtown Fort Worth.', 'Post Oak Place offers newly renovated homes, a swimming pool and heated spa, a fitness studio, and a leash-free dog park!', 'Our apartments feature hardwood-style flooring, walk-in closets, gourmet kitchens with pantries, wood-burning fireplaces, and built-in bookshelves.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 104', 'OR Text', '104', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 987 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- 2 Inch Blinds*', '- Designer Lighting*', '- Full-size washer/dryer*', '- Appliance Premium*', '- Fireplace*', '- Hardwood Flooring*', '- Paint - Upgrade Scheme*', '*', 'In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Studio', '- Cyber Cafe', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Outdoor Kitchen', '- Leash-Free Dog Park', '- Package Receiving', '- Play Park', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- New Convenient Online Payments', '- Lounge Areas', '- Covered Parking', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 75', 'Pet Policy Fee Max: $388', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $25', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $388 pet fee(non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month, per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 75 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing center for our complete pet policy details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Post Oak Place', '13950 Trinity Blvd, Euless, TX, 76040', 'UeZ2JZX2J']
